resources.string: Let me guide you on how to use this app
Type in the file size that you wish and it\'s unit
Select how fast is your internet speed connection
Slide the progress bar to match how much you already have downloaded and that\'s it!\n\nGo give it a try
Results may vary depending on the internet connection stability of your device.

Patch v1.0 is FINALLY HERE!


- Added a shiny new little intro :D
 - Added Alejandro's Profile
 - Added the About screen with some sexy patch notes for all the nerds, 8/8 m8


Side note:


Plans have now changed. After hours of trying to implement the settings with options to customize all the colors I decided to do that later because I am a n00b. bye :D


Patch v0.7.1 [Hotfix] notes:


- Added some missing translations (don't ever release a new update at 2am, ever.)
 - Fixed an issue with results not showing properly when the result was in 1 day's range
 - New app icon version #3 because there is always room for improvement :D


Known bugs:


- Super Ultra Bug called: None. You know there MUST be something really bad when your code "just works" ಠ_ಠ


Coming soon:


- The option to be able to toggle between Dark and Light mode
 - App v1.0 HYPE (づ｡◕‿‿◕｡)づ


Patch v0.7.0 note:


- Added Kbps, Mbps, Gbps and Tbps
 - Added Rate this app option to Menu
 - Added Contact to Menu
 - Added Profiles in Contact
 - Added years, months and weeks to results.
 - Now the app will be called: Down
 - Added a little note below the Calculate button
 - Moved "Progress" on top of the % number in Main Screen
 - Coming soon: Theme Settings and more


Known bugs:

 - A wild bug that prevents results from showing. Expect hotfix soon.
 - Missing some spanish translations


Patch v0.3.1 note:


- Small update to the new icon
 - Added support for Spanish language (depends on your device's language)
 - Added Days (DD) to the time results


Known bugs:

 - Second drop down list not showing properly


Patch v0.3 note:


- New icon :)
 - Fixed app crashes caused when no input was received on any TextField
 - Fixed percentage bar not showing properly in lower screen sizes/resolutions
 - Fixed time not showing zeros if the result value was lower than 10
 - Fixed File Size text field auto focusing unintentionally because Views equality is now a thing


Known bugs:

 - Second drop down list not showing properly


Patch v0.25 note:


- Added support for API 15 (Android 4.0.3+)


Upcoming fixes:

 - Time not showing correctly when the numbers are lower than 10
 - Second drop down list not showing properly


Patch v0.21 note: 


- Much app, very code, so first release, wow!
